emotional_arc: User starts confident (site loads, logo visible). Slight impatience arises when Live Preview lags before reflecting name/address. Major frustration hits when visual cue of default tab is missing—user questions whether they are on the right step. Confidence crashes when newly-added custom data never appears in the preview, making the feature feel broken. Deleting a custom field works, offering mild relief but overall trust in the editor is dented.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Live Preview latency after form edits
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Users expect real-time feedback; delays create uncertainty (“Did my input register?”).
next_actions: Investigate state-update timing; remove unnecessary debounces.
Show skeleton/‘updating…’ micro-animation while preview renders.
Add instant inline confirmation (e.g., checkmark) next to edited field.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Clear orientation in a multi-step editor is critical; missing or subtle selection styles cause confusion and way-finding errors.
next_actions: Ensure selected tab has high-contrast background that meets WCAG AA.
Use semantic <button role="tab"> with aria-selected="true" so both automation & screen-readers recognise state.
Simplify visible label to “1. From & To” (remove double spaces and dot) to avoid string-matching issues.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Custom field value not propagating to preview
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Bespoke invoice fields are a power feature; if they don’t render, users lose trust and may abandon the tool.
next_actions: Fix data binding for dynamic fields—confirm both key and value push to preview component.
Add unit test covering add-edit-delete lifecycle.
Display inline error if a custom field cannot be rendered.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Performance spikes (318 s to type into field)
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Huge delays suggest blocking calls or memory leaks; even if automated test exaggerated, any multi-second lag is unacceptable for users.
next_actions: Profile JavaScript when adding custom inputs; look for expensive re-renders.
Lazy-render only the changed part of preview rather than full refresh.
Monitor and cap image/font network requests on initial load.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: When things break, visual context speeds up debugging and reduces time-to-fix.
next_actions: Embed error message overlay in screenshot for quick triage.

first_tackles.description: Fix data binding so custom fields instantly appear in Live Preview.
Add clear, high-contrast selected state for default “From & To” tab (ARIA-compliant).
Optimize preview update pipeline to display edits within <500 ms; show loading indicator during render.
Enable automatic screenshot capture on any failed test step for faster QA turnaround.
Run performance profiling on custom-input workflow to eliminate multi-minute freezes.
